text: Stanislav Smrek (born 1 December 1986 in Košice) is a professional Slovak football defender who currently plays for the 2. liga club MFK Zemplín Michalovce. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" align=center style="font-size:90%; text-align: center;" |- !width=60 rowspan="2"|Club !width=60 rowspan="2"|Season !width=80 colspan="2"|League !width=80 colspan="2"|Cup !width=80 colspan="2"|Europe !width=80 colspan="2"|Total'' |- align=center !width=40 App | !width=40 abbr="Goals for" | !width=40 App | !width=40 abbr="Goals for" | !width=40 App | !width=40 abbr="Goals for" | !width=40 App | !width=40 abbr="Goals for" | |- align=center |rowspan="3" valign=center|MFK Košice |2007/08 |1||0||0||0||0||0||1||0 |- align=center |2008/09 |19||0||3||0||0||0||22||0 |- align=center |2009/10 |7||0||0||0||2||0||9||0 |- align=center ! align=left style="background:beige"| Total ! align=left style="background:beige"| ! align=left style="background:beige"| 27 ! align=left style="background:beige"| 0 ! align=left style="background:beige"| 3 ! align=left style="background:beige"| 0 ! align=left style="background:beige"| 2 ! align=left style="background:beige"| 0 ! align=left style="background:beige"| 32 ! align=left style="background:beige"| 0 |} Last updated: 4 January 2010 ==External links== * * Player profile MFK Košice profile * Eurofotbal profile ==References== Category:Living people Category:1986 births Category:Slovak footballers Category:MFK Zemplín Michalovce players Category:FC VSS Košice players Category:FK Bodva Moldava nad Bodvou players Category:FC MAS Táborsko players Category:Slovak Super Liga players Category:Expatriate footballers in the Czech Republic Category:Sportspeople from Košice Category:Association football fullbacks
